skyforge.GovernancePolicy.description: All limits are optional. A value of 0 means "unlimited/disabled".

allowCustomTemplateRepos.description: This is distinct from "external" because "custom" can reference arbitrary repos and is therefore riskier.
allowCustomTemplateRepos.title:
AllowCustomTemplateRepos controls whether non-admin users may use template
source = custom.

allowUserByosContainerlabServers.title:
AllowUserByosContainerlabServers controls whether non-admin users may use
user-scoped Containerlab BYOS servers (user:... refs).

allowUserByosNetlabServers.title:
AllowUserByosNetlabServers controls whether non-admin users may use user-scoped
Netlab BYOS servers (user:... refs).

allowUserExternalTemplateRepos.title:
AllowUserExternalTemplateRepos controls whether non-admin users may use template
source = external (user-scoped external repos).

maxCollectorsPerUser.title:
MaxCollectorsPerUser caps the number of in-cluster Forward collectors a user can
create.

maxDeploymentsPerUser.title:
MaxDeploymentsPerUser caps the number of deployment definitions a user can
create across all workspaces.

skyforge.GovernancePolicy.title: GovernancePolicy is a lightweight guardrail layer (admin-configurable).

skyforge.SkyforgeWorkspace.description: NOTE: This type must live in the service package (not a type alias to an internal package) to satisfy Encore's API schema rules.

allowCustomEveServers.title:
EVE-NG deployments require an endpoint. This flag enables configuring a
per-workspace EVE server.

skyforge.SkyforgeWorkspace.title:
SkyforgeWorkspace is the user-facing workspace object stored in Postgres and
returned by the API.

get.summary: FrontendAdmin serves the SPA for admin routes.
GetAdminAudit returns audit events (admin only).

get.description: This endpoint is meant for self-diagnosis: it reports the config actually seen by the running API process (including defaults), plus a list of required fields that are missing.
get.summary:
GetAdminEffectiveConfig returns the effective (non-secret) typed Encore config
(admin only).

post.summary: AdminE2ESession seeds a session cookie for CI/E2E flows without external SSO.

post.description:
This is primarily used by \`cmd/e2echeck\` so E2E tests can run without local kubectl access.

NOTE: This does not authenticate to the target device; it only verifies TCP connect and an SSH-like banner prefix ("SSH-").
post.summary:
AdminSSHProbe runs an in-cluster TCP probe to validate SSH reachability of a
list of hosts.

get.summary: ListGovernanceCosts lists cost snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceCosts ingests cost snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernancePolicy returns the current governance policy (admin only).

put.summary: UpdateGovernancePolicy updates the governance policy (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceResources lists tracked resources (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceResources ingests resource inventory (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernanceSummary returns governance summary metrics (admin only).

post.summary: SyncGovernanceSources refreshes inventory from known sources (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceUsage lists usage snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceUsage ingests usage snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetAdminImpersonateStatus returns current impersonation status (admin only).

get.description: Data is a short-lived snapshot stored in Redis by Telegraf.
get.summary: ListNodeMetrics returns a lightweight, live view of node metrics (admin only).

get.description: This is intended to answer: "are tasks queued because of real backlog, or because queue event delivery/worker execution is broken?"
get.summary: TaskQueueDiag provides admin diagnostics for the task queue.

post.description: This is an admin-only manual guardrail; the worker also runs an automatic reconciler via cron.

limit.title: Limit caps the number of queued tasks to republish.

post.summary: ReconcileQueuedTasks republishes queue events for tasks stuck in "queued".

post.description: This is an admin-only manual guardrail; the worker also runs an automatic reconciler via cron.

hardMaxRuntimeMinutes.title:
HardMaxRuntimeMinutes marks tasks as failed when they have been running longer
than this.

limit.title: Limit caps the number of running tasks to consider.

maxIdleMinutes.title: MaxIdleMinutes marks tasks as failed when they have had no logs for this long.

post.summary: ReconcileRunningTasks marks tasks that appear stuck in "running" as failed.

post.description: This is intended for development environments where you want to rerun "first-login" bootstrap (Gitea user/provisioning, default workspace, etc).
post.summary: PurgeUser removes a user and their state (admin only).
SyncWorkspaces syncs all workspaces from external systems (admin only).

get.summary: ListAwsSSOAccounts returns accounts available for the current SSO session.
ListAwsSSORoles returns roles for a selected AWS account.
GetAwsSSOConfig returns the configured AWS SSO start URL and region.

post.summary: LogoutAwsSSO clears any stored AWS SSO tokens.
PollAwsSSO polls for device authorization completion.
StartAwsSSO begins the AWS device authorization flow.

get.summary: GetAwsSSOStatus returns connection status for the authenticated user.
AzurePortalRedirect opens the Azure portal with a login hint.

post.summary: ValidateAwsSSO checks that AWS SSO credentials can mint role credentials.

ListAzureSubscriptions returns available subscriptions for the provided service
principal.
ValidateAzureSP verifies Azure service principal credentials.
ListGCPProjects returns accessible projects for the provided service account.
ValidateGCPServiceAccount verifies GCP service account JSON by minting a token.

get.summary: DashboardEvents streams a dashboard snapshot as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

get.description: This is a non-streaming companion to \`/api/dashboard/events\` used by the UI to quickly populate state (and during SSE reconnects).
get.summary: DashboardSnapshot returns the latest dashboard snapshot.

post.description: This enables "SSO" without needing to store or reuse the user's password.
post.summary:
DNSBootstrap provisions a per-user Technitium account + zone and stores a
long-lived API token in Skyforge.

get.description:
NOTE: Technitium uses localStorage tokens (not cookies). This endpoint serves a tiny HTML page that:

 1. fetches a token from Skyforge Server
 2. stores it in localStorage
 3. redirects to /dns/
get.summary:
DNSSSO bridges Skyforge auth into Technitium DNS by storing a minted token in
localStorage and redirecting.

get.description: The token is stored client-side (localStorage) by the DNS SSO bridge.
get.summary: DNSToken mints a Technitium session token for the current Skyforge user session.

ListUserForwardCollectorConfigs lists Forward collector configurations managed
by Skyforge for the current user.

post.summary:
CreateUserForwardCollectorConfig creates a new Forward collector configuration
and deploys a matching in-cluster collector.

delete.description: It intentionally does NOT delete the Forward-side collector.
delete.summary:
DeleteUserForwardCollectorConfig deletes the in-cluster resources for a
collector config and removes it from Skyforge.

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollectorConfigLogs returns the collector's `clientd.log` (or a
fallback log) for debugging.

post.summary:
RestartUserForwardCollectorConfig restarts the collector Deployment (best-effort
image update).

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollectorConfigRuntime returns runtime state for a configured
collector.

ListForwardCollectors lists collectors visible to the authenticated user's
Forward account.
GCPConsoleRedirect opens the GCP console with a login hint.
GiteaPublicSSO logs into Gitea with a read-only public account.
GetAPIHealth returns a summary of database health.
GetLDAPHealth checks LDAP connectivity.
GetNetlabRuns returns recent Netlab runs for a workspace.
GetNetlabStats returns basic Netlab server stats for the status dashboard.

get.description:
This endpoint is intended to reduce portal-side polling. It streams a small "snapshot" payload whenever notifications change for the authenticated user.

Query params: - include\_read=true|false (default false) - limit=1..100 (default 50)
get.summary: NotificationsEvents streams notifications as Server-Sent Events (SSE).
OIDCCallback finishes the OIDC flow and issues the Skyforge session cookie.
OIDCLogin starts the Dex OIDC auth flow and stores state/nonce cookies.
PublicConfig exposes non-sensitive public UI configuration.

get.description: back to the Skyforge login page, preserving the requested next hop.
get.summary:
Reauth clears the current session cookie (and any cached LDAP password) and
redirects

get.description:
Uses Docker Registry HTTP API v2 \`\_catalog\`.

Env: - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_URL (required), e.g. [https://ghcr.io](https://ghcr.io) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_USERNAME / SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_PASSWORD (optional) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_SKIP\_TLS\_VERIFY (optional: true/false) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_REPO\_PREFIXES (optional comma-separated prefixes to include)

Query: - q: substring match filter - n: server-side page size for \_catalog
get.summary: ListRegistryRepos returns available repositories from the configured registry.

ListRegistryTags returns tags for a specific repository from the configured
registry.
GetRuns returns recent runs from native Skyforge tasks.

post.summary: CreateRun is a reserved endpoint for admin-triggered native tasks.
CancelRun cancels a queued or running task.

get.description: This is implemented as a raw endpoint so it can hold a long-lived HTTP connection.
get.summary: RunEvents streams task output as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

get.description: The stream is backed by \`sf\_task\_events\` and supports \`Last-Event-ID\` replay.
get.summary:
TaskLifecycleEvents streams structured task lifecycle events as Server-Sent
Events (SSE).
GetRunOutput returns output for a specific native task.

SessionForwardAuth is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint used by Traefik
forwardAuth.

head.summary:
SessionForwardAuthHead is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint used by
Traefik forwardAuth (HEAD).

get.description:
It behaves like SessionForwardAuth on success, but on unauthenticated requests it returns a 302 redirect to Skyforge login, preserving the original request URI via the \`next\` parameter.

NOTE: Envoy's ext\_authz filter commonly forwards the original request path in \`x-envoy-original-path\` (preferred) rather than \`x-forwarded-uri\`.
get.summary: SessionForwardAuthEnvoy is a Skyforge SSO gate endpoint for Envoy ext_authz.

get.description: configured prefix (e.g. \`/api/session/forwardauth/envoy/\`), so we also expose wildcard handlers.
get.summary:
NOTE: Envoy's ext_authz `path_prefix` can append the original request path to
the
ListSnmpTrapEvents returns the current user's trap inbox.

get.description: Query params: - limit=1..1000 (default 200)
get.summary: SnmpTrapEventsStream streams SNMP trap inbox events as Server-Sent Events (SSE).
GetSnmpTrapToken is disabled: SNMPv2c communities are no longer supported.

post.summary: RotateSnmpTrapToken is disabled: SNMPv2c communities are no longer supported.

get.description: By default it returns only events mapped to the current user via \`sf\_syslog\_routes\`. Admins can request unassigned events to help claim sources.
get.summary: ListSyslogEvents returns the syslog inbox for the current user.

get.description: Query params: - limit=1..1000 (default 200)
get.summary: SyslogEventsStream streams syslog inbox events as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

delete.summary: DeleteSyslogRoute deletes a syslog route (admin only).

get.summary: ListSyslogRoutes lists configured source->user mappings (admin only).

put.summary: UpsertSyslogRoute creates/updates a syslog route (admin only).

get.summary: GetTemplates returns available templates for a workspace.
GetToolServicesStatus returns start/stop state for personal toolchain services.

post.summary: SetToolServiceReplicas sets the replica count for a personal toolchain service.

get.summary: GetUIConfig returns UI configuration values.

delete.summary: DeleteUserAWSSSOCredentials deletes AWS SSO configuration for the current user.

get.summary:
GetUserAWSSSOCredentials returns the current user's AWS SSO configuration
(non-token).

put.summary:
PutUserAWSSSOCredentials saves AWS SSO configuration (non-token) for the current
user.

delete.summary:
DeleteUserAWSStaticCredentials deletes AWS static credentials for the current
user.

get.summary:
GetUserAWSStaticCredentials returns the current user's AWS static credential
status.

put.summary: PutUserAWSStaticCredentials saves AWS static credentials for the current user.

delete.summary: DeleteUserAzureCredentials deletes Azure credentials for the current user.

get.summary: GetUserAzureCredentials returns the current user's Azure credential status.

put.summary: PutUserAzureCredentials saves Azure credentials for the current user.

delete.summary: DeleteUserGCPCredentials deletes GCP credentials for the current user.

get.summary: GetUserGCPCredentials returns the current user's GCP credential status.

put.summary: PutUserGCPCredentials saves GCP credentials for the current user.

delete.summary: DeleteUserIBMCredentials deletes IBM Cloud credentials for the current user.

get.summary: GetUserIBMCredentials returns the current user's IBM Cloud credential status.

put.summary: PutUserIBMCredentials saves IBM Cloud credentials for the current user.

get.summary:
ListUserContainerlabServers returns the current user's configured Containerlab
BYOL endpoints.

put.summary:
UpsertUserContainerlabServer creates or updates a user-scoped Containerlab
endpoint.

delete.summary: DeleteUserContainerlabServer deletes a user-scoped Containerlab server.

get.summary: ListUserEveServers returns the current user's configured EVE-NG API endpoints.

put.summary: UpsertUserEveServer creates or updates a user-scoped EVE-NG server.

delete.summary: DeleteUserEveServer deletes a user-scoped EVE server.

get.summary:
GetUserGitCredentials returns the current user's deploy key (public) and HTTPS
token status.

put.summary: UpdateUserGitCredentials sets (or clears) the user's HTTPS git token.

post.summary: RotateUserGitDeployKey rotates the user's SSH deploy key.

hasForwardPassword.title: true if a custom password is stored

get.summary:
GetUserServiceNowConfig returns the current user's ServiceNow demo integration
settings.

hasForwardPassword.title: true if a custom password is stored

put.summary:
PutUserServiceNowConfig stores the current user's ServiceNow demo integration
settings.

post.description: This does not configure ServiceNow CMDB integration (that is per-network and handled elsewhere).
post.summary:
ConfigureForwardServiceNowTicketing configures Forward SaaS to
auto-create/update incidents in ServiceNow.

InstallUserServiceNowDemo installs/configures the ServiceNow Connectivity Ticket
demo into the user's ServiceNow instance.

get.summary:
GetUserServiceNowPDIStatus checks whether the user's ServiceNow PDI is awake (or
likely sleeping).

GetUserServiceNowSchemaStatus checks whether the ServiceNow demo schema is
installed.

post.summary:
WakeServiceNowPDI attempts to wake the user's ServiceNow PDI and waits briefly
for it to become responsive.

get.summary:
ListUserNetlabServers returns the current user's configured Netlab API
endpoints.

put.summary: UpsertUserNetlabServer creates or updates a user-scoped Netlab API endpoint.

delete.summary: DeleteUserNetlabServer deletes a user-scoped Netlab server.

get.summary:
GetUserSettings returns the current user's saved defaults used to pre-fill forms
(deployments, etc).

put.summary:
PutUserSettings upserts the current user's saved defaults used to pre-fill forms
(deployments, etc).

get.summary: ListUserVariableGroups lists variable groups for the current user.

post.summary: CreateUserVariableGroup creates a variable group for the current user.

delete.summary: DeleteUserVariableGroup deletes a variable group for the current user.

put.summary: UpdateUserVariableGroup updates a variable group for the current user.

get.summary: GetWorkspaces returns workspaces visible to the authenticated user.

allowCustomEveServers.title:
EVE-NG deployments require an endpoint. This flag enables configuring a
per-workspace EVE server.

post.summary: CreateWorkspace provisions a new Skyforge workspace.

get.description: Query params: - all=true (admin only; default false)
get.summary: WorkspacesEvents streams the workspace list as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspace deletes a workspace and its backing resources.

get.summary: ListWorkspaceArtifacts lists artifact objects for a workspace.

DownloadWorkspaceArtifact returns a presigned download redirect for the
artifact.

post.summary:
CreateWorkspaceArtifactFolder creates a "folder" placeholder (zero-byte object
with trailing slash).

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspaceArtifactObject deletes a single artifact object.

post.description: This is an object-store-native alternative to the legacy \`UploadWorkspaceArtifact\` endpoint (which uses Encore's objects SDK and may require bucket subdomain DNS).
post.summary: PutWorkspaceArtifactObject writes/overwrites a single artifact object.

UploadWorkspaceArtifact uploads or presigns an artifact to the workspace's
bucket.

put.summary: PutWorkspaceAWSSSOConfig stores the AWS SSO account/role for the workspace.

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspaceGCPCredentials clears GCP credentials.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceGCPCredentials returns GCP service account status.

workspace/blueprints/external repo.

Default: "containerlab/designer".

For this endpoint, TemplatesDir must be under "containerlab/".

SaveContainerlabTopologyYAML writes a containerlab topology YAML into the user's
workspace repo so it can be

get.summary: ListWorkspaceDeployments lists deployment definitions for a workspace.

name.title: Name becomes the Skyforge deployment name (and drives the lab name).

template.title: Template is the filename under TemplatesDir.

creates a "clabernetes" deployment referencing that template, and (optionally) queues an initial deploy.

parameters.description: Alternate casing used by some UI clients.
parameters.name: forwardDelete

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspaceDeployment removes a deployment definition from Skyforge.

put.summary: UpdateWorkspaceDeployment updates an existing deployment definition.

post.summary:
RunWorkspaceDeploymentAction runs a deployment operation with consistent UX
verbs.

get.description: Intended for top growers views (week-over-week, day-over-day) without pulling Forward time series.
get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityGrowth compares the latest rollup bucket to an
earlier one and returns deltas.

GetWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityInventory returns the latest cached NQE results
for inventory/routing scale.

GetWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityDeviceMetrics proxies Forward's device-metrics
endpoint.

post.summary:
PostWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityDeviceMetricsHistory proxies Forward's
device-metrics-history endpoint.

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityInterfaceMetrics proxies Forward's
interface-metrics endpoint.

post.summary:
PostWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityInterfaceMetricsHistory proxies Forward's
interface-metrics-history endpoint.

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityUnhealthyDevices proxies Forward's
unhealthy-devices endpoint.

post.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityUnhealthyInterfaces proxies Forward's
unhealthy-interfaces endpoint.

deploymentId.description: Defaults to the deployment id in the path.
deploymentId.title: Optional override; primarily for debugging.

post.summary:
RefreshWorkspaceDeploymentCapacityRollups enqueues a background rollup task for
the deployment.

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentCapacitySummary returns the latest stored capacity rollups
for a deployment.

post.summary:
DestroyWorkspaceDeployment triggers a destructive run (destroy) for a
deployment.

put.summary:
UpdateWorkspaceDeploymentForwardConfig updates the per-deployment Forward toggle
and collector selection.

post.summary:
SyncWorkspaceDeploymentForward enqueues a Forward sync task for the deployment's
latest topology.

get.description: For Netlab deployments, this executes \`netlab status\` against the associated Netlab API and returns the output.
get.summary: GetWorkspaceDeploymentInfo returns provider-specific info for a deployment.

GetWorkspaceDeploymentInventory returns a simple inventory of nodes and
management IPs.

post.summary:
UpdateWorkspaceDeploymentLinkAdmin performs administrative link operations
(up/down) on a topology edge.

CaptureWorkspaceDeploymentLinkPcap captures a short pcap on a topology link and
uploads it as a workspace artifact.

post.description: The impairment is applied "outside" of the network OS by executing \`tc\` in the clabernetes launcher container (or another non-NOS container in the same pod netns).
post.summary:
SetWorkspaceDeploymentLinkImpairment applies or clears traffic impairment
settings for a single link.

get.description: This is used to render live link utilization on the topology graph (similar to c9s VSCode extension).
get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentLinkStats returns a snapshot of interface counters for
each topology edge.
GetWorkspaceDeploymentLinkStatsEvents streams link stats snapshots as SSE.

GetWorkspaceDeploymentNetlabGraph returns a rendered netlab topology graph for a
deployment.

post.description: This is an alternative to local SSH ProxyJump when clients can't reach the lab network.
post.summary:
NetlabConnect executes `netlab connect` on the Netlab runner host and returns
its output.

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentNodeDescribe returns a lightweight summary of the
clabernetes node pod.

GetWorkspaceDeploymentNodeInterfaces returns interface stats (launcher
container) for a clabernetes node.

get.description: This powers the "View logs" action in the topology UI (similar to the c9s VSCode extension).
get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentNodeLogs returns recent log lines for a clabernetes node
pod.

get.description: Currently supports EOS/cEOS via \`Cli -c "show running-config"\`.
get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentNodeRunningConfig fetches the running config from a NOS
node (best-effort).

post.description: For EOS/cEOS, this runs \`write memory\`.
post.summary:
SaveWorkspaceDeploymentNodeConfig triggers a best-effort "save config" operation
on a node.
StartWorkspaceDeployment starts a deployment run.

StopWorkspaceDeployment attempts to stop the most recent task for this
deployment.

get.description:
using Kubernetes \`pods/exec\` (SPDY) and a WebSocket transport to the browser.

Query params: - node: required (clabernetes/topologyNode) - container: optional - command: optional (defaults to "sh"; for EOS nodes use "Cli")
get.summary:
TerminalExecWS provides an interactive in-browser terminal into
clabernetes-backed nodes

get.description: For containerlab, the topology is sourced from the containerlab API after deploy so we can reflect the resolved management IPs.
get.summary:
GetWorkspaceDeploymentTopology returns a lightweight, provider-derived topology
view.
ListWorkspaceDeploymentUIEvents returns recent UI/graph events for a deployment.
DeploymentUIEventsStream streams deployment UI events as SSE.

post.summary: ConvertWorkspaceEveLab exports an EVE-NG lab into a Containerlab template.
ImportWorkspaceEveLab registers an existing EVE-NG lab as a deployment.

workspace.

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspaceEveServer deletes a workspace-scoped EVE-NG server.

forwardNetworkId).

parameters.description: repo-relative file within Dir (may include subdirs)

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceNetlabTemplate reads a netlab YAML template from a
workspace/blueprints/external repo.

post.description: This catches missing images, invalid attributes, and missing required plugins/templates.

setOverrides.description: They are only used by the in-cluster netlab generator (netlab-c9s), not BYOS netlab.
setOverrides.title:
SetOverrides are netlab CLI `--set` overrides (highest precedence) applied
during validation.

template.title: repo-relative file within Dir (may include subdirs)

post.summary:
ValidateWorkspaceNetlabTemplate runs `netlab create` against a selected template
bundle without deploying it.
RunWorkspaceAnsible triggers an ansible run for a workspace.
RunWorkspaceContainerlab triggers a Containerlab run for a workspace.
RunWorkspaceEveNg triggers an EVE-NG lab run for a workspace.

action.title: up, create, restart, collect, status, down

cleanup.title: for down/restart, remove workdir when true

topologyUrl.title: remote URL (only if netlab supports it)

post.summary: RunWorkspaceNetlab triggers a netlab run for a workspace.
RunWorkspaceTerraformApply triggers a terraform apply run for a workspace.
RunWorkspaceTerraformPlan triggers a terraform plan run for a workspace.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceSecureTrackCatalog returns the embedded SecureTrack check catalog.

GetWorkspaceSecureTrackChecks lists known checks (catalog + embedded .nqe
files).

post.summary:
RunWorkspaceSecureTrackCheck executes an embedded check (.nqe) and returns a
normalized response.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceSecureTrackCheck returns the .nqe file content for a given check.

post.summary:
RunWorkspaceSecureTrackNQE executes an NQE query and returns a normalized
response.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceSecureTrackPacks returns the embedded SecureTrack packs definition.

post.summary:
RunWorkspaceSecureTrackPack executes all checks in a pack (serially) and returns
per-check results.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceSecureTrackSnapshots lists snapshots for a Forward network.

put.summary:
UpdateWorkspaceSettings updates workspace-level feature flags and template repo
sources.

post.summary: SyncWorkspace syncs resources for a single workspace.

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceTerraformTemplates lists Terraform template directories for a
workspace.
ListWorkspaceVariableGroups lists variable groups for a workspace.

post.summary: CreateWorkspaceVariableGroup creates a variable group for a workspace.

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspaceVariableGroup deletes a variable group for a workspace.

put.summary: UpdateWorkspaceVariableGroup updates a variable group for a workspace.

post.summary: SyncWorkspaceBlueprint syncs a workspace's blueprint catalog into the repo.

get.summary: ListWebhookEvents returns the current user's webhook inbox.

get.description:
It emits "snapshot" events (JSON payload) whenever new webhook events are ingested for the authenticated user.

Query params: - limit=1..1000 (default 200)
get.summary: WebhookEventsStream streams the webhook inbox as Server-Sent Events (SSE).
GetWebhookToken returns the per-user webhook ingest token.

post.summary:
RotateWebhookToken rotates the per-user webhook ingest token (invalidates the
old one).

get.description: and redirects to the API testing UI.
get.summary: YaadeSSO performs a one-time login against Yaade using the shared admin account
FrontendAssets serves hashed frontend assets built by Vite.
FrontendDashboard serves the SPA for dashboard routes.
PlatformHealth serves the platform health payload.
FrontendDesign serves the SPA design sandbox route.
FrontendDocs serves embedded UI docs pages.
FrontendFavicon serves the SPA favicon (and compatibility icon paths).
CheckAll performs a comprehensive health check of all system components.
Check is a simple health check helper that verifies the application is running.

post.description:
Example:

	POST https://<hostname>/hooks/<token>/github
post.summary: WebhookIngestAny receives webhook events via tokenized URLs.

get.summary: FrontendIndex serves the SPA entrypoint.

post.description: This is used to build a lightweight "live node metrics" view without deploying a full monitoring stack. Data is stored as a short-lived snapshot in Redis.
post.summary:
IngestNodeMetric accepts host/node metrics from in-cluster collectors
(Telegraf).

post.description: Expected payload is Telegraf JSON serializer output for \`inputs.snmp\_trap\`.
post.summary: IngestSNMPTrap accepts SNMP trap events from in-cluster collectors (Telegraf).

post.description: This endpoint is intentionally unauthenticated (SSO) and guarded by an internal token header.
post.summary:
IngestSyslog accepts syslog events from in-cluster collectors (Vector/Fluent
Bit/etc).
CronCloudCredentialChecksBridge triggers cloud credential checks maintenance.
CronWorkerHeartbeatBridge triggers the worker heartbeat task.
CronReconcileQueuedTasksBridge triggers reconciliation for queued tasks.
CronReconcileRunningTasksBridge triggers reconciliation for running tasks.
CronWorkspaceSyncBridge triggers workspace sync maintenance.

post.description: This is used to detect whether any worker pods are alive when tasks are queued.
post.summary: CronWorkerHeartbeat upserts a task worker heartbeat for this worker instance.

CronReconcileQueuedTasks republishes queue events for tasks stuck in the
"queued" state.

CronReconcileRunningTasks finds long-running tasks that appear stuck and marks
them failed.

get.summary:
LogoutAll clears the Skyforge cookie and redirects to the landing page (used for
manual "reset").
FrontendManifest serves the PWA manifest.

NautobotLogout clears the Skyforge session cookie and redirects to the Skyforge
landing page.
NautobotLogoutAny handles `/nautobot/logout/*` (including a trailing slash).

NetboxLogout clears the Skyforge session cookie and redirects to the Skyforge
landing page.
NetboxLogoutAny handles `/netbox/logout/*` (including a trailing slash).
FrontendNotifications serves the SPA notifications page.

post.summary: CreateNotification creates a new notification.

get.summary: GetUserNotifications retrieves notifications for a specific user.

put.summary: MarkAllNotificationsAsRead marks all notifications for a user as read.

delete.summary: DeleteNotification deletes a notification.

put.summary: MarkNotificationAsRead marks a notification as read.

get.summary: FrontendRobots serves robots.txt.
FrontendSNMP serves the SPA for SNMP routes.
FrontendStatus serves the SPA status page.

get.description: This is designed for an unauthenticated landing page and must not leak user/workspace identifiers.
get.summary: StatusSummary returns a public, safe platform status summary.

get.description: This endpoint is public and intended to remove portal-side polling on the status page.
get.summary:
StatusSummaryEvents streams the platform status summary as Server-Sent Events
(SSE).

post.summary: Delete removes an object from the bucket.

get.summary: List returns all objects in the bucket.

post.summary: List returns all objects in the bucket.
Read retrieves data from the bucket.
Write stores data in the bucket.

delete.summary: DeleteFile deletes a file from storage.

get.summary: ReadFile downloads a file from storage.

post.summary: WriteFile uploads a file to storage.

get.summary: SwaggerOpenAPI serves the OpenAPI schema.
FrontendSyslog serves the SPA for syslog routes.
GetNotificationSettings retrieves notification settings (admin only).

put.summary: UpdateNotificationSettings updates notification settings (admin only).

get.summary:
GetPublicNotificationSettings retrieves notification settings for authenticated
users.

get.description: Skyforge uses username-based identities, so \`id\` is the username.
get.summary: ListAssignableUsers lists users that can be shared on workspaces.
SearchUsers searches LDAP for users matching q.
Version reports the running server version info.
FrontendWebhooks serves the SPA for the webhook inbox UI route.
